rooms.description: A welcoming entry with polished flooring and minimalist decor following colonial aesthetics. The orientation is designed to adhere to Vastu principles by aligning the entrance towards the northeast.
Spacious living area with ample natural light. Colonial style decor includes wood paneling and classic motifs. Adjacent to a French door opening that leads to the garden.
Fully equipped with soundproof panels and ambient lighting. Decor includes colonial elements with modern amenities to enhance viewing experience. Placed in a quiet corner as per Vastu guidelines.
A serene reading room featuring built-in bookcases and classic colonial aesthetics. Designed to face the east for optimal morning light and positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the kitchen with colonial style wood accents. The layout is designed to promote social interaction while following Vastu principles of auspicious alignments.
A modern yet colonial-inspired kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances. The placement ensures a smooth workflow and adherence to safety norms.
The studio apartment space is designed as an open concept area combining living, dining, and kitchen areas, ideal for a G+1 layout. Colonial elements are retained in the furniture and decor.

openings.description: Main entrance door with colonial-style detailing. Placed in the north to align with Vastu guidelines for prosperity.
Door leading directly into a large garden area. Enhances connection with nature and supports the luxury aesthetic.
Multiple windows to ensure ample natural light, placed according to Vastu principles for enhancing energy flow.
Balcony overlooking the garden with colonial-style balustrades. Provides an outdoor space for relaxation while adhering to local norms.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with colonial decor and an attached en-suite bathroom. Placed on the west side to balance energy flow.
Comfortable guest bedroom following colonial aesthetics. Its location is optimized for privacy while maintaining a connection with natural light.
Dedicated space for work or study, featuring classic colonial design elements and functional furniture.

openings.description: A balcony providing access from the master bedroom to an outdoor terrace, adhering to local safety standards.
Interior staircase connecting ground floor and first floor. Designed with colonial detailing for continuity in design.

rooms.description: A large garden area with colonial-style landscaping, water features, and seating areas. Designed to enhance the luxury living experience.
